DEC

18

Craniocervical Craniosacral TMJ -
International Course for BATCH 3

Thursday group will be on
December 18, 2022.

The batch 2 seminar for craniocervical and craniosacral therapy is designed
for healthcare professionals who have already completed the batch 1 seminar
or have a solid foundation in this field. The seminar focuses on advanced
techniques and practices in the diagnosis and treatment of craniocervical
and craniosacral disorders.

January 15, 2022.

The batch 3 seminar for craniocervical and craniosacral therapy is designed
for healthcare professionals who have completed the batch 1 and batch 2
seminars or have an advanced level of knowledge and experience in this field.
